name: popcorn
title: Popcorn - Explore Stremio Streams
description: A Raycast extension that uses the Stremio API to search for movies and TV shows and stream them to local media players using Stremio addons. IINA is highly recommended for macOS users.
author: martipops

commands.name: search-streams
commands.title: Search for Streams
commands.description: Search for Movies and TV shows using the Stremio API

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
